title: Berkhamsted
name: The Gatsby
directions: South end of the high street under the Rex Cinema
hours: 10:30AM-11PM Monday to Thursday  10:30AM-12:30PM Friday & Saturday 12PM-10:30PM Sunday
content: Stylish cocktail bar and restaurant in the former dining rooms of the Rex Cinema. Diners sit in opulent 1938  art deco interiors.
